text: Târgu Jiu (also spelled Tîrgu Jiu) is the capital of Gorj County, Oltenia, Romania. It is found on the shores of the Jiu River. It has a population of 101,562 people as of the year 2002. ==References== Category:County capitals of Romania Category:Municipalities of Romania Category:Cities in Romania Category:Gorj County
title: Târgu Jiu
